CCalibrationCurve Class Reference

Class to hold calibration data and calculate calibration curves. More...

#include <CalibrationCurve.h>

enum  FitInfoType { FIT_FORMULA = (unsigned int)0x01, FIT_RSQUARED = (unsigned int)0x02 }

Class to hold calibration data and calculate calibration curves.

void CCalibrationCurve::CalcBestFit ( bool  update_spectra = true  ) 

Using the spectra and fit type stored previously, calculate best fit parameters.

This function can (and by default will) update the calibration information stored within each spectrum.

static CString CCalibrationCurve::formatFitInfo ( unsigned int  infotype,
int  ctype,
double *  cparm,
int  cplen,
double  crsqr 
) [inline, static]

Format arbitrary calibration information.

Parameters:
infotype - OR-ed selection of values from FitInfoType ENUM (currently FIT_FORMULA, FIT_RSQUARED)
ctype - one of the values from curveTypefit ENUM (currently linear, Polyn2, Polyn3) ... this defines the number of necessary fit parameters
cparm - array of the fit coefficients in ascending power order
crsqr - the rsquared value
